MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Intersect(class Android.Graphics.Rect r) cil managed

Docs.param: The rectangle being intersected with this rectangle.
Docs.summary: If the specified rectangle intersects this rectangle, return true and set this rectangle to that intersection, otherwise return false and do not change this rectangle.
Docs.returns: true if the specified rectangle and this rectangle intersect (and this rectangle is then set to that intersection) else return false and do not change this rectangle.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

The second rectangle being intersected with
